"Ariete": "Excuse me, do you have a moment?"
"I have a favor to ask you. Will you hear me out?"
"Recently, we've been seeing an increase in the number of enemies in Western Retem. We'd be in a tight spot if they attacked now."
"I'd go and clear them out myself, but... Well, I'm stuck here. So I need you to go and defeat them for me."
"It won't be easy, but do your best out there."

"I see...
If you change your mind, come find me."
"Those enemy numbers look thinner already. I knew you were the right one to ask."
"We won't have to worry about an attack from the west for a good while now. Thank you for your help."
